sentence.Network_en: She broke from the inconsequent meaningless mild tone of irony.
sentence.Network_cn: 她中断了她无关痛痒,无足轻重的温和的嘲讽语调.

sentence.Network_en: As he went along, he kept mumbling inconsequent phrases.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一边走着, 嘴里一边咕噜着一些不相连贯的话.

sentence.Network_en: He was still more perplexed, for this inconsequent smile made nothing clear.
sentence.Network_cn: 他依然更加感到困惑, 因为这突如其来的一笑,使他感到莫名其妙.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin inconsequent-, from in- 'not' + consequent- 'overtaking, following closely' (see consequent)

sentences.sentence: "the quite inconsequent fellow was managed like a puppet"
